Plot: gregory invites seven friends to spend the summer at his large, secluded 19th-century home in upstate new york. the seven are: bobby, gregory's "significant other," who is blind but who loves to explore the home's garden using his sense of touch; art and perry, two "yuppies" who drive a volvo and who celebrate their 14th anniversary together that summer; john, a dour expatriate briton who loathes his twin brother james; ramon, john's "companion," who is physically attracted to bobby and immediately tries to seduce the blind man; james, a cheerful soul who is in the advanced stages of aids; and buzz, a fan of traditional broadway musicals who is dealing with his own hiv-positive status.
Title: love! valour! compassion!
